# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates an option set with the given raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The raw value to use.

## Creating an option set

- **rawValue**: The raw value of the option set.
